<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3381</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Interactive Virtual Tour of the Model of Jerusalem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive virtuelle Tour des Modells von 
Jerusalem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Excursion virtuelle interactive du modèle de 
Jérusalem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Excursão virtual interativa do modelo de 
Jerusalem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giro virtuale interattivo del modello di 
Gerusalemme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικός εικονικός γύρος του μοντέλου της 
Ιερουσαλήμ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Viaje virtual interactivo del modelo de 
Jerusalén</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Interactive Virtual tour at the Model of Jerusalem in the late second temple Period. It is possible to "walk around" and to "zoom in"</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Archeology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Jerusalem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">History</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Model of Jerusalem</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive virtuelle Tour am Modell von 
Jerusalem in der späten zweiten Bügel Periode. Zu gehen ist 
möglich, "um" und "zoom in"</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Excursion virtuelle interactive au modèle de 
Jérusalem vers la fin de la deuxième période de temple. Il 
est possible "de marcher autour de" et "bourdonner dans"</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Excursão virtual interativa no modelo de 
Jerusalem no segundo período atrasado do temple. É possível 
"andar em torno" e "para zumbir em"</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giro virtuale interattivo al modello di 
Gerusalemme verso la fine del secondo periodo del tempiale. È 
possibile "camminare intorno" e "zumare in"</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικός εικονικός γύρος στο μοντέλο της Ιερουσαλήμ
προς το τέλος της δεύτερης περιόδου ναών. Είναι δυνατό "να
περπατήσει γύρω από" και για "να μεγεθύνει"</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Viaje virtual interactivo en el modelo de 
Jerusalén en el último segundo período del templo. Es posible
"recorrer alrededor" y "enfocar en"</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Archäologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jerusalem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Modell von Jerusalem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Archéologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jérusalem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Modèle de Jérusalem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
